content.rendered:
As we did after Hurricane Harvey, we are offering our customers affected by Hurricane Irma some temporary relief from their Fundbox payments. Those customers affected by Irma are encouraged to contact us at (800) 493-0419 where our team will do whatever we can to reduce the stress of the repayment schedule for you.

From the entire Fundbox community across the U.S., our thoughts are with all of you who have been affected in the Southeast.
